task.title: Install the iiRDS plugin offline
task.shortdesc: The iiRDS plugin can be installed offline from a ZIP archive or online from the DITA-OT registry or the https://iirds.org website. This topic describes the offline installation.

prereq.p: The org.iirds.dita.package-1.0.0.zip archive is available on your local computer. The path to the sources is available at .

step.cmd: In the plugins directory for your DITA-OT installation, create a new directory org.iirds.dita.package
switch to the created directory and unpack the org.iirds.dita.package-1.0.0.zip archive.
In the bin directory of your DITA-OT installation, open a command-line client.
In the command-line client, run dita install -v.

result.p: The org.iirds.dita.package plugin is installed in your DITA-OT.

taskbody.postreq: You can build iiRDS packages from your DITA content.
